EmailTemplate.name: 201905_BK_Event_Oshkosh_mih.201905_BK_Event_Confirmation_Oshkosh_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: BendixKing Annual Customer Appreciation Event - July 23, Oshkosh, WI
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> CONFIRMATION Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}
Your registration has been confirmed for the 2019 BendixKing Annual Customer Appreciation Event. We’re excited to see you!
A copy of this email is required to enter the event. Event Detail:
- 2019 BendixKing Annual Customer Appreciation Event - Tuesday, July 23th, 2019 - 5:30-7:30 p.m. - EAA Oshkosh, WI, Booth #292
Enjoy food and beverages with our team members while learning about our experimental and certified aircraft solutions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event. Sincerely,
BendixKing Marketing Team
